I am a Data Scientist with industry experience analyzing, visualizing, and modeling data. I specialize in Python & SQL and have professional experience working with R and JavaScript. I have been involved in mentorship and community building having served as a Campus Ambassodor for AgoraIO, Ingressive LLC, CodeLN & MoringaSchool Campus Ambassador. I've mentored peers and students at Andela Learning Community and Technovation Challenge.
Served as a team and community leader at Developer Student Club (DSC) and Computing and Information Technology Club (CIT Club) in Multimedia University of Kenya.
